thread.title: Life | Pics: The Penneys Christmas jumpers we're hoping to see this winter
thread.title_full: Life | Pics: The Penneys Christmas jumpers we're hoping to see this winter - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Life | Pics: The Penneys Christmas jumpers we're hoping to see this winter
text:
We're not usually ones for jumping the gun when it comes to Christmas.
While we love the season, we think Halloween deserves all the attention until November first, and after that we don't care what buskers are singing on the streets, whether shops start decorating, and when the street lights go up.
That being said, we got horribly excited when we saw this year's Penneys Christmas jumpers. Now, we actually found the jumpers on a Primark website, so we're not 100% sure we're getting all of these, but they were all listed with euro prices, so if that's not enough to go on, nothing is.
They vary in price from €12(Rudolph) to €19(Christmas Tree) but we'll be picking ourselves up an Olaf for €16 if he makes his way over.
